dimensions.name: StateGraph Architecture
dimensions.description: Does the system use a robust StateGraph with multi-agent orchestration?
dimensions.scoring_rule: 1: No graph. 3: Single agent. 5: Deep Swarm with parallel nodes.

dimensions.name: Pydantic & Type Safety
dimensions.description: Are states typed using Pydantic and TypedDict?
dimensions.scoring_rule: 1: No types. 3: Partial types. 5: Strict Pydantic enforcement throughout.

dimensions.name: Forensic Depth
dimensions.description: Does the analysis use AST parsing and RAG-lite document analysis?
dimensions.scoring_rule: 1: Regex only. 3: Basic AST. 5: Deep AST + Citation-preserving RAG.

dimensions.name: Development Narrative
dimensions.description: Is there a clear Git execution narrative?
dimensions.scoring_rule: 1: No history. 3: Basic commits. 5: Atomic, well-structured git narrative.
